### fpsync::job

The fpsync::job class.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `fpsync::job` defined type.

##### `source`

Data type: `Any`



##### `destination`

Data type: `Any`



##### `nthreads`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: 4

##### `workers`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: []

##### `rsync_opts`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: '-az --delete --numeric-ids --relative --delete-excluded --exclude=.snapshot --exclude=.glusterfs'

##### `fpart_opts`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: '-f 10000'

##### `files_per_sync`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: ''

##### `bytes_per_sync`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: ''

##### `dir`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: ''

##### `temp_dir`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: '/var/log/fpsync'

##### `resume`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: ''

##### `use_sudo`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `false`

##### `verbose`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `false`

##### `template`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: 'fpsync/fpsync.sh.erb'

Data type: `Any`



Default value: fqdn_rand(60)
